data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Dong, Zhang, Zhi-Qiang (2019): Hoplophthiracarus sidorchukae sp. nov. (Acari, Oribatida, Phthiracaridae) from the North Island, New Zealand. Zootaxa 4647 (1): 226-230, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4647.1.15|3 occurrences
